flow.display_value: Send email base on different Database type

sys_element_mapping.value:
As part of Vulnerability scanning tool onboarding, we will be setting up new servers for vulnerability scan. To perform vulnerability scans on the following databases, hostnames and/or IP addresses need to be allowed to connect using approved Account ID. Please preform the following steps to set up Account ID.

 

Database(s): 4 - Update Record➛...➛Database ID

 

Account ID: 1 - Look Up Record➛...➛Account ID

 

1. Create the Account ID user in the MySQL database instance with the required hostnames and/or IP addresses 

 

2. Populate the complex password that was assigned to the database in ServiceNow portal.

 

https://dev17404.service-now.com/now/dbscan1/home/dbaview

 

Follow the instructions under "MySQL" section of Wiki:

https://wiki.test.com/OnboardingInstructions

 

Thank you,

CSO Organization

sys_element_mapping.value:
As part of Vulnerability scanning tool onboarding, we will be setting up new servers for vulnerability scan.

To perform vulnerability scans on the following databases, hostnames and/or IP addresses

need to be allowed to connect using approved Account ID. Please preform the following steps to set up Account ID.

 

 

Database(s): 1 - Look Up Record➛...➛Database ID

 

Account ID: 2➛...➛Account ID

 

1. Create the Account ID user in the Oracle database instance with the required hostnames and/or IP addresses.

 

2. Populate the complex password that was assigned to the database in ServiceNow portal.

 

https://dev17404.service-now.com/now/dbscan1/home/dbaview

 

 

Follow the instructions under "Oracle" section of Wiki: https://wiki.test.com/OnboardingInstructions

 

Thank you,

CSO Organization

flow.display_value: Send email base on different Database type
Send email base on different Database type

sys_element_mapping.value:
As part of Vulnerability scanning tool onboarding, we will be setting up new servers for vulnerability scan. To perform vulnerability scans on the following databases, hostnames and/or IP addresses need to be allowed to connect using approved Account ID. Please preform the following steps to set up Account ID.

 

Database(s): 4 - Update Record➛...➛Database ID

 

Account ID: 1 - Look Up Record➛...➛Account ID

 

1. Create the Account ID user in the MySQL database instance with the required hostnames and/or IP addresses 

 

2. Populate the complex password that was assigned to the database in ServiceNow portal.

 

https://dev17404.service-now.com/now/dbscan1/home/dbaview

 

Follow the instructions under "MySQL" section of Wiki:

https://wiki.test.com/OnboardingInstructions

 

Thank you,

CSO Organization

As part of Vulnerability scanning tool onboarding, we will be setting up new servers for vulnerability scan.

To perform vulnerability scans on the following databases, hostnames and/or IP addresses

need to be allowed to connect using approved Account ID. Please preform the following steps to set up Account ID.

 

 

Database(s): 1 - Look Up Record➛...➛Database ID

 

Account ID: 2➛...➛Account ID

 

1. Create the Account ID user in the Oracle database instance with the required hostnames and/or IP addresses.

 

2. Populate the complex password that was assigned to the database in ServiceNow portal.

 

https://dev17404.service-now.com/now/dbscan1/home/dbaview

 

 

Follow the instructions under "Oracle" section of Wiki: https://wiki.test.com/OnboardingInstructions

 

Thank you,

CSO Organization
